Header.title: Welcome to WeatherNode Initiative!
Header.paragraph: WeatherNode Initiative is a security API that helps to secure multiple weather sensors for the retrieval of secured weather data to the users.

About.paragraph: WeatherNode Initiative was created to ensure that data transmission within Internet of Things is secured and protected during the transaction process of an apllication with IOT.
About.paragraph2: The team focuses on weather sensors but will be further developing and experimenting with different IOT devices in the near future.

Services.name: Aggregrated Signatures
Services.text: Signatrues are aggragrated and returned in a single package which imporves security and reduces overhead transmission during the transaction.

Services.name: Accurate Reading
Services.text: Through the API, we ensure accurate reading of weather data returns and ensure integrity of the data is intact and original to the pulling.

Services.name: Historical Records
Services.text: Data is recorded and secured if needed to be reuse again. Validations and checks will be done to ensure integrity is ensure before data is returned to users.

Features.title: Secured Connection
Features.text: API will do routine checks to ensure that any connection with IOT is secured and protected even when user is not using.

Features.title: Aggregrated Signature
Features.text: All the sensors unique information are secured and returned through a single signature that is generated by our API which secures the information and returns to user.

Features.title: Minimal Downtime
Features.text: Through our system, downtime issue is minimise as the issues can be spotted as the API is tracking every step of the transaction till the information reach the end user.

Features.title: Seamless Application
Features.text: User will not face trouble using the application or API are the handlers to do the activities requested by the users.
